channel.title: Django - Today I Learnt...
channel.description: Recent content in Django on Today I Learnt...

item.title: Django doesn't flush caches between tests
item.description: This is slightly counter-intuitive as it’s different to how databases are treated by the test runner.

item.title: How Django's management commands need to be type hinted
item.description: For Django management commands with arguments, you might not expect Mypy (configured with the django-stubs plugin) to complain about this signature:
